verses.name: Mark 13:9
verses.text: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.

verses.name: Mark 13:10
verses.text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.

verses.name: Mark 13:11
verses.text: But when they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.
